title: The Nighantu and the Nirukta, the oldest Indian treatise on etymology, philology, and semantics, critically ed. from original manuscripts and tr. for the first time into english, with introduction, exegetical and critical notes, three indexes and eight appendices by Lakshman Sarup.

The Nighantu and the Nirukta, the oldest Indian treatise on etymology, philology, and semantics, critically ed. from original manuscripts and tr. for the first time into english, with introduction, exegetical and critical notes, three indexes and eight appendices by Lakshman Sarup.

The Nighantu and the Nirukta, the oldest Indian treatise on etymology, philology, and semantics, critically ed. from original manuscripts and tr. for the first time into english, with introduction, exegetical and critical notes, three indexes and eight appendices by Lakshman Sarup.

The Nighantu and the Nirukta, the oldest Indian treatise on etymology, philology, and semantics, critically ed. from original manuscripts and tr. for the first time into english, with introduction, exegetical and critical notes, three indexes and eight appendices by Lakshman Sarup.
